grep.name: Pattern Search Agent
grep.description: Searches documents for medical patterns using regex

keyword.name: Pattern Generator
keyword.description: Generates search patterns from document previews

chunk.name: Context Extractor
chunk.description: Extracts meaningful text chunks from documents

temporal_tagging.name: Temporal Tagging Agent
temporal_tagging.description: Extracts temporal information from medical documents

encounter_grouping.name: Encounter Grouping Agent
encounter_grouping.description: Groups clinical content by encounter dates

summary_extractor.name: Summary Extractor Agent
summary_extractor.description: Extracts structured summaries from medical text

timeline_builder.name: Timeline Builder Agent
timeline_builder.description: Builds chronological timelines of medical events

checker.name: Checker Agent
checker.description: Verifies accuracy and consistency of medical information

unified_extractor.name: Unified Extractor Agent
unified_extractor.description: Performs comprehensive extraction of medical entities

unified_verifier.name: Unified Verifier Agent
unified_verifier.description: Performs final verification of all extracted information

narrative_synthesis.name: Narrative Synthesis Agent
narrative_synthesis.description: Synthesizes information into coherent medical narrative

cancer_summarization.name: Cancer Summarization Pipeline
cancer_summarization.description: Fixed-sequence orchestrator for comprehensive cancer document analysis
